Marriott Bonvoy™ Credit Cards
Marriott Bonvoy™ Credit Cards
Marriott Bonvoy™ Benefits
Earn and redeem points that take you everywhere you want to go.
Join Now
Sign In
W Maldives
Destination
Where next?
Dates
Add dates
Destination
Where can we take you?
Search from current location below.
1 Night
Wed, Sep 03 - Thu, Sep 04
Find Hotels
Unlock Amazing Benefits
All members enjoy unlimited travel possibilities and the more you stay, the more benefits you unlock.
Previous tab
Member
Silver Elite
Gold Elite
Platinum Elite
Titanium Elite
Ambassador Elite
nextTab
Member
0-9 nights per year
You’re just a few nights away from bigger rewards.
Free in-Room Wi-Fi
Enjoy complimentary in-room Internet access when you book through our websites or app.
Member Rates
Enjoy exclusive discounted rates for Marriott Bonvoy Members
Mobile Check-In/Services
Use our app to check in and out, then use your phone as your room key.
All Benefits
Silver Elite
10 nights per year
Make the most of your stay
Get 10% more points
Earn 10% more points on every eligible hotel purchase, including room rate and other incidentals that can be charged to your room, such as dining and spa.
Priority Late Checkout
Sleep in or stay a little longer. Subject to availability.
Member Rates & Free Wi-Fi
Enjoy exclusive member room rates and complimentary in-room Internet access when you book through our websites or app.
All Benefits
Gold Elite
25 nights per year
Do more of what you love.
Get 25% more points
Earn 25% more points on every eligible hotel purchase, including room rate and other incidentals that can be charged to your room, such as dining and spa.
Enhanced Room Upgrade
We’ll do our best to upgrade your room upon arrival, subject to terms and conditions.
2 p.m. Late Checkout
Get a checkout time as late as 2 p.m. (subject to availability) so you can spend more time doing what you love.
All Benefits
Platinum Elite
50 nights per year
More room to spread out.
Get 50% more points
Earn 50% more points on every eligible hotel purchase, including on room rate and other incidentals that can be charged to your room, such as dining and spa.
Enhanced Room Upgrade
We’ll do our best to upgrade your room upon arrival (including Select Suites). Upgrades are subject to availability identified by each hotel and limited to your personal guest room. Subject to terms and conditions.
Welcome Gift Choice
Upon arrival, choose points, breakfast offering or amenity — varies by brand.
All Benefits
Titanium Elite
75 nights per year
Make those last-minute plans.
Get 75% more bonus points
Earn 75% more points on every eligible hotel purchase, including room rate and other incidentals that can be charged to your room, such as dining and spa.
Enhanced Room Upgrade
We’ll do our best to upgrade your room upon arrival (including Select Suites). Upgrades are subject to availability identified by each hotel and limited to your personal guest room. Subject to terms and conditions.
Welcome Gift Choice
Upon arrival, choose points, breakfast offering or amenity — varies by brand.
All Benefits
Ambassador Elite
100+ nights per year + $23,000+ USD qualifying spend per year
Maximize your stay.
Ambassador Service
Dedicated Ambassadors available to assist anytime, anywhere.
Your24™
Get the flexibility to choose the 24 hours of your stay. Check in at 9 p.m., check out at 9 p.m. the day of departure – it’s up to you.
Get 75% more bonus points
Get 75% bonus points for every eligible hotel purchase, including room rate, dining, spa, and more.
All Benefits

Marriott Bonvoy™ Benefits
Earn and redeem points that take you everywhere you want to go.
Join Now
Sign In
W Maldives
Unlock Amazing Benefits
All members enjoy unlimited travel possibilities and the more you stay, the more benefits you unlock.
Previous tab
Member
Silver Elite
Gold Elite
Platinum Elite
Titanium Elite
Ambassador Elite
nextTab
Member
0-9 nights per year
You’re just a few nights away from bigger rewards.
Free in-Room Wi-Fi
Enjoy complimentary in-room Internet access when you book through our websites or app.
Member Rates
Enjoy exclusive discounted rates for Marriott Bonvoy Members
Mobile Check-In/Services
Use our app to check in and out, then use your phone as your room key.
All Benefits
Silver Elite
10 nights per year
Make the most of your stay
Get 10% more points
Earn 10% more points on every eligible hotel purchase, including room rate and other incidentals that can be charged to your room, such as dining and spa.
Priority Late Checkout
Sleep in or stay a little longer. Subject to availability.
Member Rates & Free Wi-Fi
Enjoy exclusive member room rates and complimentary in-room Internet access when you book through our websites or app.
All Benefits
Gold Elite
25 nights per year
Do more of what you love.
Get 25% more points
Earn 25% more points on every eligible hotel purchase, including room rate and other incidentals that can be charged to your room, such as dining and spa.
Enhanced Room Upgrade
We’ll do our best to upgrade your room upon arrival, subject to terms and conditions.
2 p.m. Late Checkout
Get a checkout time as late as 2 p.m. (subject to availability) so you can spend more time doing what you love.
All Benefits
Platinum Elite
50 nights per year
More room to spread out.
Get 50% more points
Earn 50% more points on every eligible hotel purchase, including on room rate and other incidentals that can be charged to your room, such as dining and spa.
Enhanced Room Upgrade
We’ll do our best to upgrade your room upon arrival (including Select Suites). Upgrades are subject to availability identified by each hotel and limited to your personal guest room. Subject to terms and conditions.
Welcome Gift Choice
Upon arrival, choose points, breakfast offering or amenity — varies by brand.
All Benefits
Titanium Elite
75 nights per year
Make those last-minute plans.
Get 75% more bonus points
Earn 75% more points on every eligible hotel purchase, including room rate and other incidentals that can be charged to your room, such as dining and spa.
Enhanced Room Upgrade
We’ll do our best to upgrade your room upon arrival (including Select Suites). Upgrades are subject to availability identified by each hotel and limited to your personal guest room. Subject to terms and conditions.
Welcome Gift Choice
Upon arrival, choose points, breakfast offering or amenity — varies by brand.
All Benefits
Ambassador Elite
100+ nights per year + $23,000+ USD qualifying spend per year
Maximize your stay.
Ambassador Service
Dedicated Ambassadors available to assist anytime, anywhere.
Your24™
Get the flexibility to choose the 24 hours of your stay. Check in at 9 p.m., check out at 9 p.m. the day of departure – it’s up to you.
Get 75% more bonus points
Get 75% bonus points for every eligible hotel purchase, including room rate, dining, spa, and more.
All Benefits

Equipment and Services
Smart Spaces, Seamless Meetings
Plan your next meeting or event with ease at Courtyard Miami Airport. With over 20,000 sq. ft. of flexible indoor and outdoor space, expert planning support, and complimentary airport shuttles, we make getting down to business feel refreshingly simple.
Learn More
Meeting and Events
Host meetings, trainings, and events in our meeting rooms in Miami, FL for up to 80 guests.
Meeting Documents
Wi-Fi Simplified (PDF)
2025 Catering Menu (PDF)
Meet in a private boardroom with modern amenities and seating for up to 10 guests.
Present with confidence using built-in AV and support for virtual and hybrid meetings.
Enjoy personalized event planning and custom catering from our dedicated team
Stay minutes from MIA and business hubs with easy access for all your meeting guests.
Flexible spaces ideal for meetings, trainings, and social gatherings of any kind.
Tie the Knot at The Connection – Miami Airport
Make your big day unforgettable at The Connection, where elegance meets ease. Featuring over 20,000 sq. ft. of beautifully designed indoor & outdoor spaces, expert wedding planners, onsite catering, and three Marriott hotels just steps away, we create seamless celebrations from start to finish.
Learn More
Weddings and Occasions
Host your day in our event venue in Miami, FL—perfect for weddings, receptions, and celebrations
Work one-on-one with our event experts to bring your wedding vision to life—down to the last detail.
Treat your guests to delicious, tailor-made menus crafted by our on-site culinary team.
Learn More
Make travel simple for your guests with discounted room blocks just steps from your venue.
Just minutes from MIA, our hotel offers easy access for guests visiting top Miami attractions.
From rehearsals to farewell brunches, our wedding venue in Miami, FL is ideal for every celebration.
Rewarding Travel from Start to Finish
Earn up to 60,000 points per qualified event with Marriott Bonvoy Events. Elite members earn more with bonus points.
See how we're rewarding events
Please note: all room sizes are approximate.

Room Set-up Examples
Banquet
Generally used for meals and sessions involving small group discussions. A five foot round table seats eight people comfortably. A six foot round table seats 10 people comfortably.
Room Set-up Examples
Close
Conference and Hollow Square
Appropriate for interactive discussions and note-taking sessions for fewer than 25 people. Many hotels have elegant "boardrooms" for 10 to 20 people, equipped with full audiovisual capabilities, a writing board, cork board and a flip chart.
Room Set-up Examples
Close
E-Shape, U-Shape and T-Shape
Appropriate for groups of fewer than 40 people. These are best for interaction with a leader seated at the head of the setup. Audiovisual is usually best set up at the open end of the seating.
Room Set-up Examples
Close
Theater
Appropriate for large sessions and short lectures that do not require extensive note-taking. This is a convenient setup to use before breaking into discussion or role-playing groups because chairs can be moved.
Room Set-up Examples
Close
Reception
Stand-up social function where beverages and light foods are served. Foods may be presented on small buffet tables or passed by servers. May precede a meal function.
Room Set-up Examples
Close
Schoolroom or Classroom
The most desirable setup for medium to large-size lectures. Requires a relatively large room. Tables provide attendees with space for spreading out materials and taking notes.
Room Set-up Examples
Close
Ovals and Rounds
Generally used for meals and sessions involving small group discussions. A five foot round table seats eight people comfortably. A six foot round table seats 10 people comfortably.
Room Set-up Examples
Close

Frequently Asked Questions
How many event rooms does Courtyard by Marriott Miami Airport have?
Courtyard by Marriott Miami Airport has 20 event rooms.
What is the largest capacity event room at Courtyard by Marriott Miami Airport?
The largest capacity event rooms are Grand Ballroom, Tropical Cabana (outdoor). They have a capacity of 600.
Does Courtyard by Marriott Miami Airport provide wedding services?
Yes, Courtyard by Marriott Miami Airport provides wedding services.
How do I book a meeting or event at Courtyard by Marriott Miami Airport?
To book a meeting or event at Courtyard by Marriott Miami Airport
click here

Bazaar Voice
Host Your Next Event At Champions Sports Bar
Champions is the ideal place to celebrate a special event like birthdays, graduations, reunions, business luncheons and more. The restaurant serves as a nice complement to the 2,900 square feet of meeting space available at the Courtyard Miami Airport, making it the perfect venue for sports-themed events.
Please contact Danilo Lara or Jesus Garcia Moreno at
305-642-8200
or email
jesus.garciamoreno@marriott.com
or
danilo.lara@marriott.com
for more details on hosting private events.

We Are Marriott International
Travel with us as we expand our world, improve the communities we serve and open doors to new opportunities.
A Brand Leader
Offering the most powerful portfolio in the industry, our more than 30 leading brands and nearly 9,500 properties in 144 countries and territories give people more ways to connect, experience and expand their world.
Explore Our Brands
Core Values & Heritage
Founded by J. Willard and Alice Marriott, and guided by family leadership since 1927, their principles remain embedded in the company's culture and in everything we do today.
Our Story
Company Strategy
Our Growing Forward strategy encapsulates our company priorities, rooted in our core values, and guides us as we deliver on the promise of Marriott’s unique brand of hospitality around the world.
Our Strategy

Access to Opportunity & Welcoming All
At Marriott International, welcoming all and creating a sense of belonging are simply how we do business, and we believe it’s good for business.

Sustainability & Social Impact
Guided by our sustainability and social impact platform, Serve 360: Doing Good in Every Direction, Marriott International commits to creating positive and sustainable impact wherever we do business.
